881300.name: Arboreal
881300.description:
Arboreal is a top down, open world farming and adventure game where you save the world from a spreading corruption.


You inherit an abandoned orchard located on a remote island.
The people are welcoming of you, but there's more than meets the eye here.

The island's ancient inhabitants, great colossi rooted in their environment, have been infected by a strange corruption that spreads across the land like wildfire.

Discover the mysteries of the island and save your new home on July 2018!
​

The game is made by a team of 35 students, who you can find on our website. For more information on the current state of the game and its features, check out the early access segment.
881300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
